item.title: Magnus Ver add a quote by David Foster Wallace
item.description: "The really important kind of freedom involves attention, and awareness, and discipline, and effort, and being able truly to care about other people and to sacrifice for them, over and over, in myriad petty little unsexy ways, every day." -- David Foster Wallace

item.title: Magnus Ver add a quote by John Waters
item.description: "Being rich is not about how much money you have or how many homes you own; it's the freedom to buy any book you want without looking at the price and wondering if you can afford it." -- John Waters

item.title: Magnus Ver add a quote by Robert Stone
item.description: "Iâ€™ve been waiting my whole life to fuck up like this." -- Robert Stone

item.title: Magnus Ver add a quote by Padgett Powell
item.description: "The main thing is: Don't take any shit. That's the main thing. The unmain thing is: You are not going to figure anything out except how to get other people to take shit, so forget about everything except not taking any yourself." -- Padgett Powell

item.title: Magnus Ver add a quote by Padgett Powell
item.description: "the levity of the doomed has no equal." -- Padgett Powell
